bug.description:
I encountered a discrepancy between the documentation (found <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/3.1.0/d2/de8/group__core__array.html#ga937ecdce4679a77168730830a955bea7>here</denchmark-link> ) and the actual behavior of the cv::log function. Though the documentation says that log(0) will evaluate it to roughly -700, printing it indicates that it is -inf. Is this the intended behavior? <denchmark-h:h3>Please state the information for your system</denchmark-h>
OpenCV version: 3.1.0 Host OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5
Duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/4982>#4982</denchmark-link>
